com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api

Class IntegrationApiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.IntegrationApiManager

  • public class IntegrationApiManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of the integration library sdk, which controls the whole worflow process

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IntegrationApiManager(java.lang.String baseUrl, java.lang.String organizationKey)
      Constructor of the class, which create the instance of the library manager with special base domain url and organization key

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntegrationApiManager

        public IntegrationApiManager(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                             java.lang.String organizationKey)
        Constructor of the class, which create the instance of the library manager with special base domain url and organization key
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - indicate the base url of the api, where all requests will be sent. For example - https://google.com/
        organizationKey - your organization key, which will be used to authorize your requests on the server

    • Method Detail

      • switchOrganizationKey

        public void switchOrganizationKey(java.lang.String organizationKey)
        Method will change replace the current organization key
        Parameters:
        organizationKey - update the current organization key

      • switchBaseUrl

        public void switchBaseUrl(java.lang.String baseUrl)
        Method will change replace the current base url with another one
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - update the base url of the api, where all requests will be sent. For example - https://google.com/

      • setProcessListener

        public void setProcessListener(IWorkflowProccessListener proccessListener)
        Set the listener for the whole workflow process and manage the process on the mobile side
        Parameters:
        proccessListener - instance of the interface to manage the workflow process actions

      • changeUserPassword

        public void changeUserPassword(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String oldPassword,
                               java.lang.String newPassword,
                               IBaseApiListener<com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.BaseResponse> listener)
        Method will executer request for changing user password
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
        userName - username, for which password will be reset
        oldPassword - current user password
        newPassword - new user password
        listener - if password was changed successfully IBaseApiListener.onSuccess(Object) will be called, otherwise IBaseApiListener.onError(Exception)}

      • resetPassword

        public void resetPassword(java.lang.String applicationCode,
                          android.content.Context context,
                          java.lang.String workflowType,
                          java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String workflowKey)
        Start workflow process for resetting password
        Parameters:
        applicationCode - the code of the application ApplicationCode
        context - pass the application context into the method
        userName - username, for which workflow will be started
        workflowKey - workflow key for resetting password

      • startWorkflow

        public void startWorkflow(java.lang.String applicationCode,
                          android.content.Context context,
                          java.lang.String workflowType,
                          java.lang.String userName)
        Method will start the workflow process with checking the active pending activities
        Parameters:
        applicationCode - the code of the application ApplicationCode
        context - pass the application context into the method
        workflowType - the type of the workflow, which will be executed
        userName - username, for which workflow will be started

      • startWorkflow

        public void startWorkflow(java.lang.String applicationCode,
                          android.content.Context context,
                          java.lang.String workflowType,
                          java.lang.String userName,
                          boolean checkPendingActivities)
        Method will start the workflow process, you can specify to check the pending activities or not
        Parameters:
        applicationCode - the code of the application ApplicationCode
        context - pass the application context into the method
        workflowType - the type of the workflow, which will be executed
        userName - username, for which workflow will be started
        checkPendingActivities - boolean flag determines should the integration library check on existing workflows before it will start the new one

      • startWorkflow

        public void startWorkflow(java.lang.String applicationCode,
                          android.content.Context context,
                          java.lang.String workflowType,
                          java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String workflowKey,
                          boolean checkPendingActivities)
        Method will start the worklow process with a specific key If @param workflowKey is null or empty, workflow key will be pick from the server response according to the workflow type
        Parameters:
        applicationCode - the code of the application ApplicationCode
        context - pass the application context into the method
        workflowType - the type of the workflow, which will be executed
        userName - username, for which workflow will be started
        workflowKey - pass null, if you want to use key from the server. In other cases your param key will be used instead of the server key
        checkPendingActivities - boolean flag determines should the integration library check on existing workflows before it will start the new one

      • processActivityData

        public void processActivityData(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.String activityCode,
                                java.lang.String activityData)
        Worklflow process constist of the few stages - process activities. After starting workflow, users of this SDK get the task PendingActivity from the integration library in the callback IWorkflowProccessListener.onContinueEnroll(String, PendingTask)} and after handling the corresponding PendingActivity developer should pass the data back into the integration library through the method processActivityData(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
        activityCode - code of the pending activity which developer will get in the IWorkflowProccessListener.onContinueEnroll(java.lang.String, com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.PendingTask)
        activityData - string data which developer will be get after the handling corresponding pending activity PendingActivity

      • sendBehavioSecData

        public void sendBehavioSecData(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String behavioSecData,
                               java.lang.String workflowType,
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               IBaseApiListener<com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.BehaviorSecResponse> listener)
        If you use behaviosek SDK BehavioSec Service, and your API has configured route to handle the behavioSec data, you can use this method to send request and handle the API response in the listener IBaseApiListener
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
        behavioSecData - this data will be generated by the behavioSec SDK BehavioTimings.getTimingsAsJSONString()
        workflowType - the type of the workflow, which will be executed
        userName - username, for which workflow will be started
        listener - callback to handle the API response

      • sendMultipartRequest

        public void sendMultipartRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                 java.lang.String url,
                                 byte[] data,
                                 IBaseApiListener<byte[]> responseListener)
        Use this method to send multipart request
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
        url - full address where api will send request
        data - array of bytes
        responseListener - callback to handle the API response

      • sendPostRequest

        public <T extends com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.BaseResponse> void sendPostRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                    java.lang.String endpoint,
                                                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> responseClass,
                                                                                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                                                                                    IBaseApiListener<T> listener)
        Method for sending post request with Map params
        Type Parameters:
        T - describes the response object, users can extend the BaseResponse and override method BaseResponse.parse(JSONObject) to handle the response by themselves
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
        endpoint - request address
        responseClass - response class
        params - map with request params
        listener - callback to handle the API response

      • sendGetRequest

        public <T extends com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.BaseResponse> void sendGetRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                   java.lang.String endpoint,
                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> responseClass,
                                                                                                   IBaseApiListener<T> listener)
        Method for sending get request

      • sendPostRequest

        public <T extends com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.BaseResponse> void sendPostRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                    java.lang.String endpoint,
                                                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> responseClass,
                                                                                                    java.lang.String jsonBody,
                                                                                                    IBaseApiListener<T> listener)
        Method for sending post request with json body as String
        Type Parameters:
        T - describes the response object, users can extend the BaseResponse and override method BaseResponse.parse(JSONObject) to handle the response by themselves
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
        endpoint - request address
        responseClass - response class
        jsonBody - json body as string
        listener - callback to handle the API response

      • calculateUserScore

        public void calculateUserScore(android.content.Context context,
                               IBaseApiListener<com.solus.integrationlibrary.data.api.response.ScoreResponse> responseListener)
        This method will calculate the score. Note, that you can execute it only after successful completed workflow, in other case you will get IllegalStateException in the IWorkflowProccessListener.onWorkflowError(Throwable, String, String)

      • cancelWorkflow

        public void cancelWorkflow(android.content.Context context)
        Developer can cancel the current workflow process with this method
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method

      • cancelAllRequests

        public void cancelAllRequests(android.content.Context context)
        This method will cancel all requests from the queue. You can use it to handle your lifecycle in the application
        Parameters:
        context - pass the application context into the method
